posts.content:
'This call may be recorded and we exchange information with all other insurance companies'

Insurer - You need to send proof of your no claims bonus
Me - I don't have it, all my docs are online, can you just call them?
Insurer - We need the proof otherwise the premium will increase or policy cancelled
Me - Well you must be able to get the information from my other insurer as you all 'exchange information'
Insurer - Oh no other insurance companies will not 'exchange information' with us. You have to request it

I give up

JUST KAMPERS INSURANCE have now written to tell me they have cancelled my Bug policy due to not providing them with documents.

This is after sending them my no claims proof, photos of the vehicle (all sides, interior and engine!), a garage overnight declaration, a mileage declaration and a signed will leaving everything to JUST KAMPERS in the event of my death (okay I made the last bit up).

And their Customer Services shuts at 5.30pm (WHEN EVERYONE GETS HOME FROM WORK AND READS THEIR MAIL) so my call at 5.34 when I got home never got answered.

JUST KAMPERS can kiss my
JK .... customer service. Im shocked. Try buying panels off them, Then you learn the meaning of, We don't give a toss we are selling ....!
